casebody.data:
The People ex rel. Daniel Griffin vs. The Judges of the New York Common Pleas. Motion for a mandamus to the defendants.—This motion was on affidavits and notice; the notice asked for costs. After argument on the merits, it was denied; and costs given against the relator, for the reason that he asked costs in his notice. A. Thompson, Relator’s Counsel. A. M. Burt, Relator’s Atty. Wm. PI. Bell, Lefts Counsel. Bell and Coe, Lefts Attys.

Notice of motion for a mandamus, should not ask for costs.
